languages.text: "Владыка этой палубы, второй по важности среди богов после Марнат. Когда-то смертные жестоко обманули его доверие, и теперь он не говорит с ними и не покровительствует им. Лишь шаману отвечает Преф, и то изредка".

"The master of this deck, the second most important god after Marnat. Mortals cruelly betrayed his trust once, and he hasn't talked to them or protected them since. Pref only ever answers the shaman's invocations, and only occasionally at that."
languages.original_text: "Владыка этой палубы, второй по важности среди богов после Марнат. Когда-то смертные жестоко обманули его доверие, и теперь он не говорит с ними и не покровительствует им. Лишь шаману отвечает Преф, и то изредка".

traits.locale_text: "The master of this deck, the second most important god after Marnat. Mortals cruelly betrayed his trust once, and he hasn't talked to them or protected them since. Pref only ever answers the shaman's invocations, and only occasionally at that."
traits.speaker: Chief

traits.speaker: Chief

traits.locale_text: "The master of this deck, the second most important god after Marnat. Mortals cruelly betrayed his trust once, and he hasn't talked to them or protected them since. Pref only ever answers the shaman's invocations, and only occasionally at that."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: 「このデッキのマスターにして、マルナトに次ぐ重要な神だ。かつて人間は、無情にも彼の信頼を裏切った。それ以来、人間と話をすることも、人間を守ることもない。プレフは祈祷師の祈りにしか答えたことがなく、それも滅多にない」
languages.original_text: "The master of this deck, the second most important god after Marnat. Mortals cruelly betrayed his trust once, and he hasn't talked to them or protected them since. Pref only ever answers the shaman's invocations, and only occasionally at that."

traits.locale_text: 「このデッキのマスターにして、マルナトに次ぐ重要な神だ。かつて人間は、無情にも彼の信頼を裏切った。それ以来、人間と話をすることも、人間を守ることもない。プレフは祈祷師の祈りにしか答えたことがなく、それも滅多にない」
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: “他是这层甲板的主人，是地位仅次于玛纳特的神明。凡人曾残酷地背叛过他，从那以后，他再也没有和凡人说过话，也不再保护他们。普雷弗只回应萨满的召唤，而且只是偶尔回应。”
languages.original_text: "The master of this deck, the second most important god after Marnat. Mortals cruelly betrayed his trust once, and he hasn't talked to them or protected them since. Pref only ever answers the shaman's invocations, and only occasionally at that."

traits.locale_text: “他是这层甲板的主人，是地位仅次于玛纳特的神明。凡人曾残酷地背叛过他，从那以后，他再也没有和凡人说过话，也不再保护他们。普雷弗只回应萨满的召唤，而且只是偶尔回应。”
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: « Le maître de ce pont et la divinité la plus importante après Marnat. Un jour, les mortels ont trahi sa confiance de la manière la plus cruelle qui soit, et depuis, il refuse de leur parler ou de les protéger. Pref ne répond que rarement aux invocations des chamans. »
languages.original_text: "The master of this deck, the second most important god after Marnat. Mortals cruelly betrayed his trust once, and he hasn't talked to them or protected them since. Pref only ever answers the shaman's invocations, and only occasionally at that."

traits.locale_text: « Le maître de ce pont et la divinité la plus importante après Marnat. Un jour, les mortels ont trahi sa confiance de la manière la plus cruelle qui soit, et depuis, il refuse de leur parler ou de les protéger. Pref ne répond que rarement aux invocations des chamans. »
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: «El maestro de esta cubierta, y el segundo dios más importante después de Marnat. Los mortales traicionaron cruelmente su confianza y no ha hablado con ellos ni los ha protegido desde entonces. Pref solo responde a las invocaciones del chamán, pero no siempre».
languages.original_text: "The master of this deck, the second most important god after Marnat. Mortals cruelly betrayed his trust once, and he hasn't talked to them or protected them since. Pref only ever answers the shaman's invocations, and only occasionally at that."

traits.locale_text: «El maestro de esta cubierta, y el segundo dios más importante después de Marnat. Los mortales traicionaron cruelmente su confianza y no ha hablado con ellos ni los ha protegido desde entonces. Pref solo responde a las invocaciones del chamán, pero no siempre».
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Der Meister dieses Decks, der zweitwichtigste Gott nach Marnat. Sterbliche haben einst grausam sein Vertrauen verraten, und er hat seitdem weder mit ihnen noch gesprochen, noch sie beschützt. Präf antwortet immer nur auf die Beschwörungen des Schamanen, und auch das nur gelegentlich."
languages.original_text: "The master of this deck, the second most important god after Marnat. Mortals cruelly betrayed his trust once, and he hasn't talked to them or protected them since. Pref only ever answers the shaman's invocations, and only occasionally at that."

traits.locale_text: "Der Meister dieses Decks, der zweitwichtigste Gott nach Marnat. Sterbliche haben einst grausam sein Vertrauen verraten, und er hat seitdem weder mit ihnen noch gesprochen, noch sie beschützt. Präf antwortet immer nur auf die Beschwörungen des Schamanen, und auch das nur gelegentlich."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Bu güvertenin efendisi ve Marnat'tan sonraki en önemli tanrı. Ölümlüler, zamanında onun güvenine zalimce ihanet etti. O zamandan bu zamana onlarla ne konuşmuş ne de onları korumuştur. Pref, yalnızca şamanın yakarışlarına yanıt verir. O da bazen."
languages.original_text: "The master of this deck, the second most important god after Marnat. Mortals cruelly betrayed his trust once, and he hasn't talked to them or protected them since. Pref only ever answers the shaman's invocations, and only occasionally at that."

traits.locale_text: "Bu güvertenin efendisi ve Marnat'tan sonra ikinci en önemli tanrı. Ölümlüler, zamanında onun güvenine zalimce ihanet ettiler ve o zamandan bu zamana onlarla ne konuşmuş, ne de onları korumuştur. Pref yalnızca şamanın yakarışlarına yanıt verir. O da bazen."
traits.speaker: Chief
